representation_information.name: MXF Generic Container Mapped to Uncompressed Images
representation_information.description: Essence container for the MXF file format that carries uncompressed video. Although most mapping information is provided in SMPTE ST 384, a detailed listing of nine picture essence types is provided in Annex G (section G.2.25 in the 2009 edition) of SMPTE ST 377-1.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
